CustomField.formula: ISPICKVAL( Extended_Cloud_SLAs__c , 'Yes') || ( Non_Standard_Support_Terms_Formula__c = TRUE) || ISPICKVAL( Non_standard_Payment_Terms__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Refund_Clause__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Non_standard_Liability_Cap_2X__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Non_standard_Liability_Cap_2X__c , 'Yes - High Risk') || ISPICKVAL( Non_Standard_Indemnity__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Performance_Parent_Bank_Guarantees__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Performance_Parent_Bank_Guarantees__c, 'Yes - On Request') || ISPICKVAL( Non_Standard_Warranties__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Non_Standard_Warranties__c , 'Yes - High Risk') || ISPICKVAL( Liquidated_Damages__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Future_Functionality__c , 'Yes') || NOT ISBLANK( Other_Non_Standard_Clauses__c )
CustomField.label: Non-Standard Terms
